name: logarithmically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to a logarithm (= a number that shows how many times a number has to be multiplied by itself to produce another number): The auto industry has grown logarithmically around the world. Pitch scale is logarithmically related to frequency. See
logarithm
More examplesFewer examplesIn a collaboration, as you add more people, the complications increase logarithmically, not just mathematically. Adult cells grew logarithmically in medium supplemented with whole blood serum.The tiniest room at an ultra-luxurious hotel is more than $1,000 a night, with suites logarithmically higher.
